title: Did the White House press secretary say that a visit to Japan should "be beyond'her?
subtitle: The comments made by Josh Ernest on diplomatic relations with Japan around 2016, the anniversary of Pearl Harbor, did not provide guidance that veterans should "be above it."
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The White House Press Secretary Josh Ernest said that World War II warriors who were "irritated" with diplomatic relations with Japan on Pearl Harbor's anniversary in 2016 should "get over it."
